Manipulation des données c'est _fun_.

```{r loading_data}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
```

## regarde les données

```{r}
gapminder
```

## ggplot2

```{r}
ggplot(gapminder, aes(x = year, y = lifeExp)) + 
  geom_point()
```

Aussi possible avec des boxplots

```{r}
ggplot(gapminder, aes(x = year, y = lifeExp, group = year)) + 
  geom_boxplot() + 
  geom_point()
```

line plot

```{r}
ggplot(gapminder,
       aes(x = year,
           y = gdpPercap,
           group = country)) + 
  geom_line(colour = "darkgreen",
            size = 3,
            alpha = 0.1)
```
